name: Shooter Virus
description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

A shooter game where you have to kill enemies and find the keys to complete the level. You are in an organism where viruses have settled, your task is to kill them and find a way out.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Control:

W | A | S | A - Moving around the map.

Space - jump.

1, 2, 3 - Switch the type of weapon.

R - Reloading of weapons.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a game for Windows platform only!

------------------------------------------------------------------------

FlexDev [2020 - 2022]
